name: Auth0
description: Integrate with Auth0 to list, get, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Users
tools.description: List Auth0 users. Optionally search using Lucene query syntax or filter by connection.

tools.name: Get User
tools.description: Retrieve details of a specific Auth0 user by their user_id. Returns profile, identities, and metadata.

tools.name: List Connections
tools.description: List Auth0 connections (identity providers). Returns connection names, strategies, and enabled clients.

tools.name: List Clients
tools.description: List Auth0 clients (applications). Returns client names, IDs, app types, and callback URLs.

tools.name: Block User
tools.description: Block or unblock an Auth0 user by setting the blocked flag. Blocked users cannot log in.
